summary: an orc house with storage, work area, etc for an orc or anyone who likes the look of orc. This is my first mod...
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod, so go easy on me. Umdumph Stump is a small orc house wedged inside a cave, deep in the woods, and hand built from crap by Umdumph himself. The house is for any lonely orc player or anyone who likes the look of orc, to claim. I notice there isn't much orc themed player houses; so, I built one... 

It features: 
one bedroom for two to sleep
a living room
a kitchen
a basement with alchemy and enchanting table
a backyard cave area with a forge, tanning area, workbench etc
a front yard gazebo area for another to sleep like a guard or something
emote marker friendly for companions for immersion.

..To be honest, I hate orcs and don't play one. I would suggest you and 2 other companions occupy the place since it is cramped inside. The house is located south of Dawnstar near Fort Fellhammer-find Umdumph and you'll find the key.
author: Diesha
